oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man, who has missed his aim in shooting, throws springbok bones, in order that another man may do likewise. (L VIII.-11. 7010 rev., note). !hau-!hau is a charm made so that a man may make another miss his aim on the hunting-ground.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !hau-!hau Explanation of (a hunting charm)
